.. isopy documentation master file, created by
   sphinx-quickstart on Thu Nov  8 10:01:21 2018.

isopy: A python package for data processing in geo/cosmochemistry
*****************************************************************
Isopy is a python 3 package that provides a set of custom numpy arrays that aims to simplify data processing
in geo/cosmochemistry.


.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents

   Installation <installation>
   Examples <examples>
